Birmingham's Most Beautiful Baby Shower Venue

Celebrate your bundle of joy with elegant d√©cor, gender reveals & halal catering in Sparkbrook

Searching for the perfect baby shower venue in Birmingham? LUXE VENUE is the West Midlands' most beloved maternity celebration venue, specializing in beautiful baby showers, exciting gender reveal parties, and intimate pregnancy celebrations. Located at 86 Leopold Street, Birmingham B12 0UD in the family-oriented Sparkbrook neighborhood, our venue is close to Birmingham Women's Hospital, Heartlands Hospital maternity units, and family-friendly areas like Hall Green, Moseley, Kings Heath, and Acocks Green.

As Birmingham's premier baby celebration venue, we understand that welcoming a new baby is one of life's most precious moments. Whether you're planning a traditional baby shower in Birmingham, an exciting gender reveal party, a cultural godh bharai ceremony, or a blessing celebration, LUXE VENUE provides the elegant space, beautiful d√©cor, and thoughtful amenities that make your maternity celebration truly memorable.

Why Expectant Families Choose LUXE VENUE for Baby Showers

When searching for baby shower venues in Birmingham, expectant mothers need a venue that's comfortable, accessible, and beautiful. LUXE VENUE has earned the trust of families across Birmingham, Hall Green, Moseley, Kings Heath, Acocks Green, Balsall Heath, Sparkhill, Tyseley, Small Heath, Solihull, and surrounding areas. Our ground-floor venue with easy access is particularly appreciated by pregnant mothers who want to avoid stairs and difficult entry.

Our Sparkbrook location (B12 postcode) is perfectly positioned for family celebrations. The area is close to Birmingham Women's Hospital (10 minutes), Heartlands Hospital maternity department (12 minutes), and numerous family health centers. Your guests traveling from Hall Green (8 minutes drive), Moseley (10 minutes), Kings Heath (12 minutes), or Solihull (15 minutes) will find our venue conveniently accessible with ample free parking.

What makes LUXE VENUE the best gender reveal venue in Birmingham is our expertise in creating memorable reveal moments. We've hosted hundreds of Pakistani baby showers with traditional Godh Bharai customs, Indian maternity celebrations with Seemantham rituals, Bangladeshi baby blessings, and modern gender reveal parties with creative surprise elements that delight guests and create viral-worthy moments.

Exciting Gender Reveal Ideas at LUXE VENUE

Planning a gender reveal party in Birmingham? LUXE VENUE offers creative reveal options including: Balloon pop box filled with pink or blue balloons that burst out when opened, confetti cannons releasing colored confetti for dramatic reveals, smoke bombs in our outdoor area creating Instagram-worthy photos, gender reveal cakes with colored filling inside, pi√±ata reveals filled with colored candies, and scratch card reveals for intimate group sharing.

Our team can coordinate with your hospital or midwife to keep the gender secret, prepare the reveal setup, and ensure the surprise moment is perfectly timed and captured. Many Birmingham families love our gender reveal party packages that include venue hire, themed d√©cor, reveal props, and professional photo opportunities.

Delicious Baby Shower Catering & Refreshments

Every beautiful baby shower in Birmingham deserves delicious food! Our 100% halal catering includes pregnancy-safe, expectant mother-friendly menus. Popular baby shower food options include elegant finger sandwiches (cucumber, egg mayo, chicken), fresh seasonal fruit platters, vegetable crudit√©s with hummus, cheese and crackers, samosas and vegetable spring rolls, mini quiches and pastries, cupcakes and dessert bars, mocktails and refreshing drinks (no caffeine options), and stunning dessert tables with themed treats.

For cultural baby showers, we offer traditional foods for Pakistani Godh Bharai (mithai, fruit chaat, samosas), Indian baby showers (ladoo, coconut sweets, savory snacks), and Bangladeshi celebrations (pitha, mishti). All food is freshly prepared, beautifully presented, and accommodates dietary restrictions including vegetarian, vegan, and allergy-friendly options.

Frequently Asked Questions

Is LUXE VENUE suitable for baby showers in Birmingham?

Absolutely! LUXE VENUE is one of Birmingham's most popular baby shower venues, perfect for intimate maternity celebrations. Our elegant 70-guest capacity space provides the ideal setting for baby showers, gender reveal parties, and pregnancy celebrations. Located in Sparkbrook B12, we serve expectant families from across Birmingham, Solihull, Hall Green, Moseley, Kings Heath, and Acocks Green.

Do you host gender reveal parties?

Yes! We specialize in exciting gender reveal parties with customizable setups including balloon pop boxes, confetti cannons, smoke bombs (outdoor area), cake cutting reveals, and scratch card reveals. Our team can help coordinate the surprise element, ensuring only designated people know the gender before the big reveal moment.

What baby shower d√©cor themes are available?

We offer stunning baby shower d√©cor packages including popular themes: neutral boho (pampas grass, earth tones), pink princess (floral, butterfly, unicorn), blue prince (teddy bears, stars, clouds), jungle safari, woodland animals, rainbow baby, twinkle twinkle little star, and elegant gold/silver setups. All d√©cor is customizable to match your vision.

Is the baby shower catering halal?

Yes, all our baby shower catering is 100% halal certified. Popular menu options include elegant finger sandwiches, fresh fruit platters, vegetable crudit√©s with dips, samosas and spring rolls, cupcakes and pastries, mocktails and refreshing drinks, and stunning dessert tables. We can create custom menus matching your cultural preferences.

How much does a baby shower cost at LUXE VENUE?

Baby shower packages start from ¬£500 for venue hire including 3-hour booking, tables, chairs, and basic setup. D√©cor packages range from ¬£200-600 depending on theme complexity. Catering costs ¬£10-20 per person. A complete baby shower for 40 guests typically costs ¬£1,200-2,000 including venue, d√©cor, and catering.

Can we have ladies-only baby showers?

Absolutely! Many Muslim and South Asian families prefer ladies-only baby showers. We provide complete privacy with private entrance, female-only service staff options, curtained windows, and secure venue access. This makes LUXE VENUE perfect for traditional Pakistani, Indian, and Bangladeshi baby showers where ladies prefer women-only celebrations.

What time slots are available for baby showers?

Popular baby shower time slots include afternoon tea parties (2pm-5pm), evening celebrations (6pm-9pm), and weekend brunches (11am-2pm). We offer flexible timing for weekdays and weekends. Most Birmingham families choose afternoon slots perfect for daytime celebrations with natural lighting for photos.

Can we bring our own baby shower games and activities?

Yes! You're welcome to organize baby shower games like baby bingo, guess the baby food, diaper raffle, advice cards, baby predictions, and photo booth props. We provide tables for game stations, display areas for gifts, and comfortable seating arrangements. Our sound system can play background music during activities.

Do you accommodate cultural baby shower traditions?

Absolutely! We understand and respect various cultural baby celebration traditions including Pakistani Godh Bharai ceremonies, Indian Baby Shower rituals (Seemantham, Valaikaapu), Bangladeshi maternity blessings, Arab baby celebrations, and African naming ceremonies. We can incorporate cultural customs, traditional foods, and religious blessings into your celebration.

Is parking available for baby shower guests?

Yes, free on-street parking is available on Leopold Street and surrounding roads in Sparkbrook. The venue is also accessible via public transport - well-connected by buses from Birmingham city centre, Hall Green, Acocks Green, and Solihull. Many expectant mothers appreciate the easy accessibility with no stairs or difficult access.
